ProjectTitle: Tailoring ion exchange membranes and process for lithium resource recovery from battery waste
InitialFeedbackHistory: 28/06/2023 [REDACTED] description of how you will document your research data and whether or not you will use a particular metadata standard (if so which) is confusing and makes me think you are not sure what is meant with metadata and data documentation. [REDACTED] a look at the guidance we provide: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata [REDACTED] data documentation and metadata need to explain how your data were generated and what they mean, so other researchers can also understand and use your data.
